title: How to Buy Meat for Your Grill
description: Mike Evensen from Better Meat Company explains how to buy meat from the butcher.

asset.title: How to Buy Meat for Your Grill
asset.description: Mike Evensen from Better Meat Company explains how to buy meat from the butcher.
asset.author: Char-Broil Grills

transcripts: Trade secret for looking for a great piece of meat is the marbling, especially when you're dealing with a rib steak. You want a piece of meat that is got nice marbling in it. Sometimes you're gonna have a little chunk of fat in the center but that's very common you don't want a marble of fat that takes up the whole eye. also don't be afraid to buy discounted or 30 day old pieces of meat because those pieces of meat are gonna be aged up a little bit and they're actually gonna eat some ways better than something that was just packed two days ago.
